评论详情: The iron on is incredibly wrinkled and looks awful.
Perfect for work, lounging, or running errands around Valentine’s Day. I love it!
Fit was perfect and the quality of the t shirt was great!! We did have a bauble with the shipping time got here a little late but the quality was great! No breaking or mess ups.
So cute and so soft! The print was great as well!
Love this. I purchased for Valentine's Day to wear to work. Great why to encourage my students. Fit was great and great quality.
It was a really cute shirt, however I paid for only a 1 use. I washed this shirt once and the design faded tremendously.
Cool heart design and positive affirmations! T-shirt is lightweight but not see through. I’m 5’10 and the medium fits perfectly.

评论概述: Fits a bit snug but great quality
评论详情: This is definitely a women's cut t-shirt, it fits kind of tightly, and the sleeves are on the shorter side, but it's a great shirt.
This shirt is true to size, comfortable, soft and good quality. Holds up well to washing and drying. I would recommend.

This shirt fits exactly as expected. The fabric is very standard weight tee shirt fabric. The colors of the fabric are as expected. The images are the plasticy type added onto the fabric. They look slightly washed out in places which is intentional for the style. This washes well.

评论概述: Comfortable T-Shirt with a Positive Message!
评论详情: This is a cute Valentine’s t-shirt. I am not a teacher, but I do not feel you need to be to wear this t-shirt.  It has a great message.  I ordered an extra-large (I am 5’ 7”, 130ish pounds, 36D) which fits just right--it is not too big nor is it form fitting.  I like my clothes to be comfortable which I am in this shirt.  The t-shirt is lightweight.  It is breathable and it has some stretch to it.  I like the retro looking design.  The white and pink stand out against the red. I love the positive message on this t-shirt. The t-shirt washes up great (cold water on colors cycle and then into the dryer for a couple of minutes before hanging up).  While I will be wearing this t-shirt during the first half of February (I wear a different Valentine’s each day through the fourteenth), I do feel the t-shirt can be worn any time of the year.
Nice soft tshirt material. The design seems to actually be screenprinted and not just like, ironed on cheaply. Really nice edition to my teacher t-shirt collection!
Very nice and cute t shirt ! Love the pattern and print. The shirt material is comfy and soft and stretchy. Fit perfectly as a loose fit - I sized up 1 so I could have that loose oversized fit.

Shirt is just as it looks on Amazon. My 10 year old granddaughter wanted this but it only came in adult sizes. Since she's in that stage between a large/x-large child or an x-small adult. The smallest this shirt came was a small, so we got it in that size because she really liked it. Once it arrived, it looked a bit big for her, but she tried it on and it fits almost perfect. I personally don't mind it being a big large, because then she can wear it longer as she grows. The print is crisp and not blurry and the shirt itself is not flimsy. Overall, great choice!

While this is intended to be a Valentine's shirt, I think you could probably get by wearing it whenever. I appreciate the message it sends. The shirt itself is a nice shade of pink. It fits well. It's soft enough.

I'm not a teacher, but I love this tee. It's got a great message :). The tee itself is well made, the material is light weight but not see through. The graphic is really good, but it does have a little bit of that plastic feel in parts. This tee is TTS. I followed their size chart and chose my usual medium. It's perfect. This is a Valentine tee, but I think it works anytime.
